meanings.definition: A plant of the amaryllis family, native to southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The nerine in our garden bloomed beautifully this spring.
meanings.sent2: I planted a nerine bulb in the flower bed.
meanings.sent3: The nerine seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as vibrant as a blooming nerine.
meanings.sent5: The bright pink nerine stood out among the green leaves.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the amaryllis family, native to southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The nerine genus includes many different species.
meanings.sent2: I read about the nerine genus in a botanical book.
meanings.sent3: The nerine genus party was a hit among plant enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: The nerine genus spread its roots far and wide.
meanings.sent5: Each nerine genus member has its own unique beauty.
